participant_1.background:
I got a new dog last Christmas and we love going running together.
music has always been my number one passion.
i enjoy watching football and hockey games.
I have a collection of larp weapons and armor.
I have a cat who was a stray that we adopted.

participant_2.background:
I grew up with my parents and siblings.
i keep my hair cut very short.
I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms.
i have recently started working as a freelance designer.
My favorite TV shows are usually medical dramas or comedies, because they're relatable to my job and help me relax.

content.text: Hey there, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch tv shows, especially medical dramas and comedies.
Oh cool, what's your favorite medical drama?
I like Grey's Anatomy and House. What about you?
I love Grey's Anatomy too! I also like House, Scrubs, and The Good Doctor.
I've heard good things about The Good Doctor. What's it about?
It's about a young surgeon with autism who is trying to make his way in the medical field. It's really good.
Sounds interesting, I'll have to check it out.
You should, it's a great show. What about comedies? What's your favorite?
I like Modern Family and The Office.
I love Modern Family! I've never seen The Office.
You should definitely check it out, it's really funny.
Ok, I will. I'm always looking for new shows to watch.
What do you do for work?
I'm a freelance designer.
Oh cool, what kind of design do you do?
I do mostly web design, but I also do some graphic design and branding.
That sounds interesting. How did you get started in that?

I've always been interested in design, and I took some classes in college. I started out freelancing on the side while I was working in a corporate design job, and eventually I was able to quit my job and do it full-time.
That's awesome! I'm glad it worked out for you.
Me too! I love my job.
What's your favorite thing about it?
I love the creative freedom and the ability to work on my own schedule.
That sounds great. I'm happy for you.
Thanks!
